It is a simple entity class that is used to model the product category data in the application\\u0027s database.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/dto/ThuMuaNguyenLieuDto.java\":\"This file employee file, parses the file, and saves the employee data to the database.\\n\\n`downFileEmp`: This function handles the download of an employee file in Excel format.\\n\\n`uploadImage`: This function handles the upload of an image file, stores the file, and returns the file information.\\n\\n`viewOrDownloadImage`: This function handles the retrieval and download of an image phone number, address, and associated employee.\\n\\nThe file does not contain any functions, as it is a simple DTO class with fields and constructor annotations provided by the Lombok library.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/service/CongDoanService.java\":\"This file contains a service class for managing the operations related to the `CongDoan` (Work Process) entity in a Spring Boot application.\\n\\n`CongDoanService`: This class provides the service layer for handling CRUD operations related to the `CongDoan` entity.\\n\\n`findAll()`: This function retrieves a list of all `CongDoan` entities and converts them to `CongDoanDto` objects.\\n\\n`save(CongDoanDto dto)`: This function creates a new `CongDoan` entity based on the provided `CongDoanDto` object and saves it to the database.\\n\\n`update(CongDoanDto dto)`: This function updates an existing `CongDoan` entity based on the provided `CongDoanDto` object.\\n\\n`delete(Integer id)`: This function deletes a `CongDoan` entity with the specified ID.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/dto/HinhDangDto.java\":\"This file contains a single class:\\n\\n`HinhDangDto`: A data transfer object (DTO) that It is a simple DTO class that holds the `id` and `ten` properties of the `HinhDang` entity, which is likely used for data transfer between the application layers.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/fileEnum/TacVu.java\":\"This file does not contain any classes or functions. It defines an enumeration called `TacVu` (Vietnamese for \\\"Task\\\") that represents different types of tasks or roles within an organization, such as \\\"Sale\\\", \\\"Maketing\\\", \\\"Trợ lý\\\" (Assistant), \\\"kế toán\\\" (Accounting), and \\\"in\\\" (Printing). Each task has a corresponding description string that can be accessed using the `getDescription()` method.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/service/NhanVienService.java\":\"This file contains a service class for managing employee (NhanVien) data in a Spring Boot application.\\n\\n`NhanVienService`: This class provides methods for performing CRUD operations on employee data, including finding all employees, finding an employee by ID, deleting an employee, saving a new employee, updating an existing employee, and saving a list of new employees.\\n\\n`findAll()`: Returns a list of all employees.\\n`findById(String aLong)`: Finds an employee by their ID and returns a DTO representation of the employee.\\n`delete(String id)`: Deletes an employee by their ID.\\n`save(NhanVienDto dto)`: Saves a new employee and returns a DTO representation of the saved employee.\\n`update(NhanVienDto dto)`: Updates an existing employee and returns the updated DTO.\\n`saveAll(List\\u003cNhanVienDto\\u003e list)`: Saves a list of new employees and returns a list of the saved DTOs.\\n`delete(NhanVien entity)`: Deletes an employee entity.\\n`findByIdContains(String id)`: Finds employees whose ID contains the given string.\\n`findByHoTenContains(String hoTen)`: Finds employees whose name contains the given string.\\n`findByTaiKhoan_SdtContains(String sdt)`: Finds employees whose phone number contains the given string.\\n`findByBoPhan(BoPhan bp)`: Finds employees belonging to the given department.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/Exception/CustomerException.java\":\"This file contains an exception handling mechanism for a Spring Boot application.\\n\\n`CustomerException`: A class that extends `ResponseEntityExceptionHandler` and provides custom exception handling for the application.\\n\\n`handelBuses(BadReqException ex, WebRequest request)`: A method that handles `BadReqException` and returns a `ResponseEntity` with a custom error message and a `BAD_REQUEST` status.\\n\\n`handelBuses(FileStorageException ex, WebRequest request)`: A method that handles `FileStorageException` and returns a `ResponseEntity` with a custom error message and an `INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR` status.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/service/ChamCongService.java\":\"This file contains a service class for managing attendance records (ChamCong) in a Spring Boot application.\\n\\n`ChamCongService`: A service class that provides CRUD operations for ChamCong entities.\\n\\n`findAll()`: Retrieves a list of all ChamCong entities.\\n`save(S entity)`: Saves a ChamCong entity to the database.\\n`findById(Long aLong)`: Retrieves a ChamCong entity by its ID.\\n`delete(ChamCong entity)`: Deletes a ChamCong entity from the database.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/entity/NguyenVatLieu.java\":\"This file defines an entity class `NguyenVatLieu` (Raw Material) for a database table named `nguyen_vat_lieu`. The class represents a raw material with properties such as name, purchase price, source, unit of measurement, and date of purchase.\\n\\n`NguyenVatLieu`: An entity class that represents a raw material in the database.\\n\\n`prePersist()`: A method that sets the `ngayNhap` (purchase date) to the current date when a new `NguyenVatLieu` object is created.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/entity/KhachHang.java\":\"This file defines a Java class `KhachHang` (Customer) that represents a customer in a database. The class has several properties, including an ID, name, phone number, associated employee, and address. The class is annotated with Lombok annotations to generate getters and setters, and it is mapped to a database table named `khach_hang` using JPA (Jakarta Persistence API) annotations.\\n\\nThe file does not contain any functions, only the definition of the `KhachHang` class.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/service/QuyTrinhService.java\":\"This file contains a service class for managing the operations related to the `QuyTrinh` (Process) entity in the application.\\n\\n`QuyTrinhService`: This class provides the service layer for handling the CRUD operations related to the `QuyTrinh` entity.\\n\\n`findAll()`: This function retrieves a list of all `QuyTrinh` entities and maps them to a list of `QuyTrinhDto` objects.\\n\\n`save(QuyTrinhDto dto)`: This function saves a new `QuyTrinh` entity or updates an existing one based on the provided `QuyTrinhDto` object.\\n\\n`update(QuyTrinhDto dto)`: This function updates an existing `QuyTrinh` entity based on the provided `QuyTrinhDto` object.\\n\\n`delete(Long id)`: This function deletes a `QuyTrinh` entity with the specified ID.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/repository/ImagesRepository.java\":\"This file contains a single interface named `ImagesRepository` that extends the `JpaRepository` interface provided by Spring Data JPA.\\n\\n`ImagesRepository`: This interface provides methods for interacting with the `Images` entity in the database.\\n\\n`findByTenTep(String tenTep)`: This method retrieves an `Images` entity based on the `tenTep` (file name) property.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/dto/SanPhamDto.java\":\"This file contains a data transfer object (DTO) class for the `SanPham` entity in the `com.example.longphungapp.entity` package.\\n\\n`SanPhamDto`: A DTO class that represents the properties of a product, including its ID, name, unit of measurement, product type, color, material, shape, price, and barcode.\\n\\nThe file does not contain any functions, but rather defines the properties and data structure of the `SanPhamDto` class, which is used to transfer product-related data between different layers of the application.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/entity/DonHuy.java\":\"This file defines an entity class `DonHuy` that represents a canceled order in a Java application.\\n\\n`DonHuy`: An entity class that represents a canceled order, containing information such as the reason for cancellation, the associated production stage, the cancellation date, and the original order.\\n\\n`prePersist()`: A method that sets the `ngayHuy` (cancellation date) to the current date when a new `DonHuy` entity is created.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/dto/NguyenVatLieuDto.java\":\"This file contains a single class:\\n\\n`NguyenVatLieuDto`: A data transfer object (DTO) that represents the properties of the `NguyenVatLieu` entity, including its ID, name, purchase price, source of purchase, unit of measurement, and date of purchase.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any functions. It serves as a data transfer object to encapsulate the relevant information about a `NguyenVatLieu` entity, which is likely used in the application\\u0027s business logic or for data exchange between different components.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/repository/SP_KhoRepository.java\":\"This file contains a single interface named `SP_KhoRepository` that extends the `JpaRepository` interface provided by Spring Data JPA.\\n\\n`SP_KhoRepository`: This interface provides a set of CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for the `SP_Kho` entity.\\n\\nThe file does not contain any classes or functions. It defines a repository interface that allows for the management of `SP_Kho` entities in a Spring Data JPA-based application.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/service/TaiKhoanService.java\":\"This file contains a service class and several functions related to managing user accounts.\\n\\n`TaiKhoanService`: A service class that provides methods for managing user accounts, including finding all user accounts, saving a new user account, finding a user account by ID, and updating an existing user account.\\n\\n`findAll()`: Retrieves a list of all user accounts.\\n\\n`save(TaiKhoanDto dto)`: Saves a new user account based on the provided `TaiKhoanDto` object.\\n\\n`findById(String s)`: Retrieves a user account by its ID.\\n\\n`update(TaiKhoanDto dto)`: Updates an existing user account based on the provided `TaiKhoanDto` object.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/dto/CongViecCTDto.java\":\"This file contains a data transfer object (DTO) class and does not have any functions. The file is used to define the structure of the `CongViecCTDto` class, which represents a work item in the application.\\n\\n`CongViecCTDto`: A DTO class that represents a work item, containing information such as the work stage, KPI, dates, related order details, and employee details.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/controller/QuyTrinhController.java\":\"This file is a Spring Boot controller class that handles CRUD operations for a \\\"QuyTrinh\\\" (Process) entity.\\n\\n`QuyTrinhController`: This class is a REST controller that provides endpoints for managing the \\\"QuyTrinh\\\" entity.\\n\\n`getList()`: This function retrieves a list of all \\\"QuyTrinh\\\" entities.\\n`save()`: This function creates a new \\\"QuyTrinh\\\" entity.\\n`update()`: This function updates an existing \\\"QuyTrinh\\\" entity.\\n`delete()`: This function deletes a \\\"QuyTrinh\\\" entity by its ID.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/repository/ChamCongRepository.java\":\"This file contains a single interface `ChamCongRepository` that extends the `JpaRepository` interface provided by Spring Data JPA. The purpose of this interface is to provide a set of standard CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for the `ChamCong` entity.\\n\\n`ChamCongRepository`: This interface provides a set of standard CRUD operations for the `ChamCong` entity.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/repository/ChatLieuRepository.java\":\"This file contains a single interface named `ChatLieuRepository` that extends the `JpaRepository` interface provided by Spring Data JPA. The `ChatLieuRepository` interface is responsible for providing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for the `ChatLieu` entity in the application\\u0027s database.\\n\\n`ChatLieuRepository`: This interface provides a set of standard CRUD operations for the `ChatLieu` entity, allowing the application to interact with the database.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/repository/NhanVienRepository.java\":\"This file contains a repository interface named `NhanVienRepository` that extends the `JpaRepository` interface. The repository provides methods for interacting with the `NhanVien` entity in the database.\\n\\n`NhanVienRepository`: This interface provides methods for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on the `NhanVien` entity.\\n\\n`findByTaiKhoan_Sdt`: Finds a `NhanVien` entity by the phone number (sdt) of its associated `TaiKhoan` entity.\\n\\n`findMaxIdByChucVu`: Finds the maximum ID of `NhanVien` entities that match the given prefix.\\n\\n`findAllSdt`: Retrieves a list of all phone numbers (sdt) associated with `NhanVien` entities.\\n\\n`findByIdContains`: Finds `NhanVien` entities where the ID contains the given string.\\n\\n`findByHoTenContains`: Finds `NhanVien` entities where the full name (hoTen) contains the given string.\\n\\n`findByTaiKhoan_SdtContains`: Finds `NhanVien` entities where the phone number (sdt) of the associated `TaiKhoan` entity contains the given string.\\n\\n`findByBoPhan`: Finds `NhanVien` entities that belong to the given `BoPhan` (department).\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/repository/DonHuyRepository.java\":\"This file contains a single interface `DonHuyRepository` that extends the `JpaRepository` interface provided by Spring Data JPA. The purpose of this interface is to provide a set of standard CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for the `DonHuy` entity.\\n\\n`DonHuyRepository`: This interface provides a set of standard CRUD operations for the `DonHuy` entity.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/controller/NhanVienController.java\":\"This file appears to be a Spring Boot controller class for managing employee (NhanVien) data. Here\\u0027s a summary of the classes and functions in the file:\\n\\n`NhanVienController`: This class is responsible for handling HTTP requests related to employee management, such as retrieving a list of employees, creating, updating, and deleting employees, and searching for employees based on various criteria.\\n\\n`getList()`: This function retrieves a list of all employees.\\n`getSanXuat()`: This function retrieves a list of employees from the \\\"San Xuat\\\" (Production) department.\\n`createAcc()`: This function creates a new employee account.\\n`updateAcc()`: This function updates an existing employee account.\\n`deleteAcc()`: This function deletes an employee account.\\n`getBoPhan()`: This function retrieves a list of all available departments.\\n`getChucVu()`: This function retrieves a list of all available job titles.\\n`getTacVu()`: This function retrieves a list of all available tasks.\\n`searchdata()`: This function searches for employees based on various criteria, such as name, ID, or phone number.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/Exception/BadReqException.java\":\"This file contains a single class:\\n\\n`BadReqException`: A custom exception class that extends `RuntimeException` and is used to represent a bad request error with a HTTP status of 400 (Bad Request).\\n\\nThe file does not contain any functions. It simply defines a custom exception class that can be used to handle bad request errors in a Spring-based application.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/controller/SanPhamController.java\":\"This file appears to be a Spring Boot controller class that handles CRUD operations for a product (SanPham) entity.\\n\\n`SanPhamController`: This class is a REST controller that provides endpoints for managing product-related operations.\\n\\n`getList()`: This function retrieves a list of all products.\\n\\n`getListNhomSP()`: This function retrieves a list of product groups (Truong).\\n\\n`getDoViTinh()`: This function retrieves a list of all units of measurement (DonViTinh).\\n\\n`createProd()`: This function creates a new product.\\n\\n`update()`: This function updates an existing product.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/service/CongViecService.java\":\"This file appears to be a Spring Service class that handles the business logic for managing tasks and orders in an application.\\n\\n`CongViecService`: A service class that provides methods for managing tasks and their associated data.\\n\\n`findAll()`: Retrieves all the tasks.\\n`findByTrangThai(TrangThai trangThai)`: Retrieves tasks based on their status.\\n`findByNhanVien_IdAndTrangThai(String id, TrangThai trangThai)`: Retrieves tasks assigned to a specific employee and with a specific status.\\n`findCongViecHoanThanh(String id)`: Retrieves the completed tasks for a specific employee.\\n`getNhanVienTK(Long id)`: Retrieves the employee ID associated with a specific task.\\n`setViec(Long id, TrangThai trangThai)`: Updates the status of a task and creates a new record in the task history.\\n`setDonHangCT(Long id)`: Updates the status of an order detail and the overall order status based on the status of all order details.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/confi/FileStorageProperties.java\":\"This file does not contain any classes or functions. Instead, it defines a configuration class `FileStorageProperties` that is used to store the properties related to file storage, specifically the directory for uploading images. This class is annotated with `@Data` from Lombok, which generates boilerplate code for getters, setters, and other methods. It is also annotated with `@Component` to make it a Spring-managed bean, and `@ConfigurationProperties(prefix \\u003d \\\"file\\\")` to bind the properties to the \\\"file\\\" prefix in the application configuration.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/entity/CongViecCT.java\":\"This file defines the `CongViecCT` entity class, which represents a task or work item in a system. The class has several properties, including an ID, a KPI flag, dates for receiving and assigning the task, and associations with other entities such as `DonHangCT`, `CongDoan`, and `NhanVien`. The class also has an enumeration property `TrangThai` to represent the status of the task.\\n\\nThe file does not contain any functions, only the definition of the `CongViecCT` entity class.\",\"/target/generated-sources/annotations/com/example/longphungapp/Interface/MapperInterfaceImpl.java\":\"This file appears to be an implementation of a `MapperInterface` using the MapStruct library. It provides mapping functions between various entity and DTO (Data Transfer Object) classes. Here\\u0027s a summary of the classes and functions in the file:\\n\\n`MapperInterfaceImpl`: This class implements the `MapperInterface` and provides the mapping functions between the entity and DTO classes.\\n\\n`toEntity(TaiKhoanDto)`: Converts a `TaiKhoanDto` object to a `TaiKhoan` entity.\\n`toDto(TaiKhoan)`: Converts a `TaiKhoan` entity to a `TaiKhoanDto` object.\\n`toEntity(NhanVienDto)`: Converts a `NhanVienDto` object to a `NhanVien` entity.\\n`toDto(NhanVien)`: Converts a `NhanVien` entity to a `NhanVienDto` object.\\n`toEntity(SanPhamDto)`: Converts a `SanPhamDto` object to a `SanPham` entity.\\n`toDto(SanPham)`: Converts a `SanPham` entity to a `SanPhamDto` object.\\n`toEntity(ChatLieuDto)`: Converts a `ChatLieuDto` object to a `ChatLieu` entity.\\n`toDto(ChatLieu)`: Converts a `ChatLieu` entity to a `ChatLieuDto` object.\\n`toEntity(LoaiSpDto)`: Converts a `LoaiSpDto` object to a `LoaiSp` entity.\\n`toDto(LoaiSp)`: Converts a `LoaiSp` entity to a `LoaiSpDto` object.\\n`toEntity(DoViTinhDto)`: Converts a `DoViTinhDto` object to a `DoViTinh` entity.\\n`toDto(DoViTinh)`: Converts a `DoViTinh` entity to a `DoViTinhDto` object.\\n`toEntity(HinhDangDto)`: Converts a `HinhDangDto` object to a `HinhDang` entity.\\n`toDto(HinhDang)`: Converts a `HinhDang` entity to a `HinhDangDto` object.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/confi/WebSocketConfig.java\":\"This file is a Spring Boot configuration class that sets up WebSocket communication for a web application.\\n\\n`WebSocketConfig`: This class implements the `WebSocketMessageBrokerConfigurer` interface and configures the WebSocket message broker.\\n\\n`registerStompEndpoints`: This function registers the STOMP endpoint for WebSocket communication and sets the allowed origins based on the `cors.allowed-origins` property.\\n\\n`configureMessageBroker`: This function configures the message broker to use the `/topic` prefix for publish-subscribe messaging and the `/app` prefix for application-specific messaging.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/dto/ImagesDto.java\":\"This file contains a single class:\\n\\n`ImagesDto`: A data transfer object (DTO) that represents the properties of an image, including its ID, name, file name, and status.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any functions. It is a simple DTO class used to transfer data between the application and other components.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/dto/LichSuCVDto.java\":\"This file contains a single class:\\n\\n`LichSuCVDto`: A data transfer object (DTO) that represents the history of a work task, including the employee, the specific work task, the completion date, and the status of the task.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any functions. It is a simple DTO class that holds data related to the history of a work task.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/repository/DVVCRepository.java\":\"This file contains a single interface named `DVVCRepository` that extends the `JpaRepository` interface provided by Spring Data JPA.\\n\\n`DVVCRepository`: This interface provides a set of CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for the `DVVC` entity.\\n\\nThe file does not contain any functions, as it is an interface that defines the contract for interacting with the `DVVC` entity in the database using Spring Data JPA.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/dto/KhoDto.java\":\"This file contains a single class:\\n\\n`KhoDto`: A data transfer object (DTO) that represents the `Kho` entity, containing information about a warehouse, including its ID, name, phone number, address, and associated distribution center.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any functions. It is a simple DTO class that is used to transfer data between the application and other components, such as the database or external services.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/service/ImageService.java\":\"This file contains a service class for managing image files and their storage in a database.\\n\\n`ImageService`: A service class that handles the storage, retrieval, and deletion of image files.\\n\\n`storeImageFile`: Stores an image file and returns the file name.\\n`storeUploadFile`: Stores an image file and returns the corresponding `Images` entity.\\n`loadImageFile`: Retrieves an image file by its filename.\\n`deleteImageFile`: Deletes an image file by its filename.\\n`storeFile`: A helper function that handles the storage of a file, with an option to return the corresponding `Images` entity.\\n`createFileName`: Generates a unique filename for a given file.\\n`loadFileResource`: Retrieves a file resource by its filename.\\n`deleteFile`: Deletes a file by its filename and removes the corresponding `Images` entity from the database.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/longphungapp/entity/DonHang.java\":\"This file defines the `DonHang` entity, which represents an order in a system.
